## MySQLConnectionOptions.insecureAuth property

Unused (the underlying module does not use this functionality).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insecureAuth?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Originally, allow connecting to MySQL instances that ask for the old (insecure) authentication method.
